recipe.title: Olive-Onion Puffs
ingredients: 1 cup chopped pitted black olives, drained (about 4 ounces)
1 sourdough baguette, cut crosswise on slight diagonal into 1/2-inch thick slices
instructions: Preheat broiler. Stir olives, cheese mayonnaise and onions in small bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper. Mound 1 tablespoon olive mixture on each bread slice. Arrange on baking sheet. Broil until topping is heated through and begins to brown, about 2 minutes. Serve hot.
